Our Methodology

A research-driven, high-touch process that eliminates guesswork and maximizes quality of hire.

01

Discovery & Alignment

We don't start with a job description. We start with a conversation. We learn your business goals, team dynamics, and the specific challenges this hire must solve.

02

Market Mapping

Our research team maps out the relevant talent landscape, identifying target companies and high-performing individuals who meet your criteria.

03

Precision Sourcing

We engage candidates through personalized, peer-level outreach. We sell your vision, not just a role, capturing the interest of elite passive talent.

04

Rigorous Evaluation

Each candidate undergoes a multi-stage vetting process. We evaluate technical skill, leadership aptitude, and cultural alignment before you ever see a resume.

05

Presentation & Interviewing

You receive a curated shortlist of candidates. We coordinate all logistics and provide detailed debriefs after every round of interviews.

06

Placement & Follow-up

We assist with offer negotiation, background checks, and resignation advisory. Post-hire, we stay in touch for 6 months to ensure a smooth transition.
